REUTERS.UNKNOWN: E F f2312 reute u f BC-COMTERM,-GENERAL-INST 04-07 0053

TEXT.TITLE: COMTERM, GENERAL INSTRUMENT (GRL) IN CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: (Comterm Inc) said it signed an agreement to manufacture computer terminals for General Instrument Corp to be used in the company's computerized electronic lottery systems. Comterm did not give the value or other details of the contract. Reuter
